page.title: 13THE BADGER
page.content: {Badger The badger has quite a big set with lots of tunnels.They can have a main entrance,two breeding chambers,a sleeping chamber,another entrance,an old breeding chamber,and quite a few communicating tunnels. In the old days men used to catch badgers and put them in a barrel on its side then get two bull dogs to go into the barrel and fight and the dogs always won but this is against the law now. The badger is about 1 metre long and weighs up to 40 pounds.It is mainly a blackish grey a white head with a strip of black on each side. They eat insects,mice,voles,fruit,nuts,snakes, rabbits and lots of others.It has been seen at Inverarnie a few times.
